scene.name: intro
scene.line: `(Singing, softly.)` ... trace an orbit 'round the road / and close your eyes with holy dread / for we on mold and whiskey fed / and drank from rivers down below ...
We found your "strangers." We know how to fix your damned machine. But I'm not sure it was worth it.
Oh! Soon, the visions will return! What have you found?
scene.option: They say you need to type in a specific phrase to restore it.
They say you need to unplug it for a while.
They say you need to scrape the mold off the "timing crystals."

scene.name: phrase
scene.line: Oh ... a bit of a poem to rally the illustrious spirit! Of course. Well, then: type away! By all means, do not hesitate: type away!

scene.name: unplug
scene.line: Unplug it! Of course ... restore the software to its initial state. Let it course again, through the moldy circuits, fresh and rejuvenated, ready to thrive! Well, then: unplug it! By all means, do not hesitate: unplug the machine!

scene.name: mold
scene.line: But the mold ... of course! Too `much` mold on the timing crystal would send the simulation adrift, each moment lived out of sync. By all means, yes: clean the timing crystal!
